title: ODIGHI ONYE NWERE IKE KA CHINEKE

content: Key Bb 4/4
By W. Oleka
Odighi Onye nwere ike ka Chineke.
Amamihe mmadu adighi ka nke Chineke.
Ihunanya mmadu adighi ka nke Chineke.
Umu mmadu bianu k'anyi kele Chineke
O bu Ya bu Onye kere igwe.
Onye obula tinye olu n'ikele Chukwu,
O ga agbaghar'u njo ma unu gozie Ya.
Were obi ocha, n'obi anuri nabata Jesu,
Otito n'ekele na onu ka O na achon'obi anyi.
Obi ebere ka Chukwu ji zite nwa Ya n'uwa,
Nwa Ya Jesu huru uwa n'anya, nwụrụ.
Maka njo uwa.
Mee ezi ebere maka njo nke Iji mehie Jesu,
O ga agbaghara gi njo ma ikwuputa ha nile.
Cheta, Onye nwe anyi achoghi onwu nke onye mmehie.
O choro ka orogharia bia bie ezi ndu.
Ike Chukwu ka Jesu ji ma oru ebube
Ike Chukwu ka O ji site n'onwu binite.
Ike Chukwu ka eji agbanwo achicha na Mmanya,
Ha we buru ahu n'obara nke Dinwenu Jesu.
Kelenu Chukwu Onye ike nile di n'aka Ya,
Rio Ya ka o nye unu ike imeri ajo muo.
Odighi onye nwere ike dika Chineke,
Otito n'ekele nile diri Chineke
